page.title: 09HOMELIFE IN THE MARSKE AREA.
page.content: Amenities-homes all electrically lit. Heating and cooking by oil, solid fuel & electricity. Some central heating. Floors-carpets or vinyl tiles. Walls-painted or wallpapered. Still some Do-It-Yourself decorating. Hot & cold running water, flush toilets, baths &/or showers in all houses. Automatic washing machines & electric irons. Electric vacuum cleaners. Food largely traditional. Main meals-meat, fish, eggs, cheese, fruit & vegetables. Home Deep Freezers-storage of home grown vegetables & fruit, home baking and meat. Most women at home-housekeeping and caring for families. A few go out to work. Small children attend playschool & Dancing classes elsewhere. Home sewing and Knitting still popular. Cats and dogs kept as pets. Little vandalism or break-ins.
